column1: User:मुझे प्राप्त ऑर्डर पूरी तरह से खराब गुणवत्ता का है, मैं इस सेवा से बहुत निराश हूं और अपना ऑर्डर वापस करना चाहता हूं, इसके लिए चरण बताएं

Bot:I am sorry to hear that you are not satisfied with the quality of the order you received. I understand your frustration and would be happy to help you return your order.

To return your order, please follow these steps:

1. Go to the "Your Orders" page on our website.
2. Find the order you want to return and click on the "Return" button.
3. Select the reason for your return and follow the instructions on the screen.

Once you have completed these steps, we will process your return and issue a refund to your original payment method.

Please note that you may be required to provide additional information, such as photos of the damaged item, in order to complete your return.

**Would you like me to verify your account so that you can change your delivery time or payment method?**
